string-array.name: answer4
string-array.item: You said, that your dog had eaten your homework, and your teacher didn\'t trust you.
You got what you would expect.
He calms down, but still gives you a bad grade.
You have done your homework, congrats.
You went home, but when you needed to write the test again, you failed.
You gave it to the teacher, but you never received finder money.
The fire alarm goes off and the teacher extinguish the fire. But now all students are out of the building.
You successfully left the exercise unfinished.
